metadata.description: MAG team's curated collection of Claude Code plugins for modern full-stack development with LLM performance tracking and E2E skill testing

plugins.name: code-analysis
plugins.description: Deep code investigation with claudemem. v3.2.2: Updated for claudish v4.5.1 (--agent flag removed). v3.0.0: ENRICHMENT MODE.

plugins.name: multimodel
plugins.description: Multi-model collaboration, orchestration, and workflow patterns. v2.4.1: Updated for claudish v4.5.1 (--agent flag removed). Hook logging simplified. 15 E2E tests.

plugins.name: agentdev
plugins.description: Create, implement, and review Claude Code agents and commands with multi-model validation, LLM performance tracking, and session-based artifact isolation. v1.5.2: Updated for claudish v4.5.1 (--agent flag removed).

plugins.name: seo
plugins.description: Highly autonomous SEO toolkit (~80% autonomy) with AUTO GATEs, self-correction loops, and multi-model validation. v1.6.2: Updated for claudish v4.5.1 (--agent flag removed). Features E-E-A-T self-assessment, keyword research, content optimization, technical audits.

plugins.name: video-editing
plugins.description: Professional video editing toolkit with FFmpeg operations, Whisper transcription, and Apple Final Cut Pro project generation. v1.1.0: Added explicit name: fields to commands for prefix-free invocation. Features intelligent video analysis, automated transcription with timing sync, FCPXML timeline creation.

plugins.name: nanobanana
plugins.description: AI image generation and editing using Google Gemini 3 Pro Image API. v2.3.0: Added explicit name: fields to commands for prefix-free invocation (/generate instead of /nanobanana:generate). Simple Node.js CLI with markdown styles and batch generation.

plugins.name: conductor
plugins.description: Context-Driven Development workflow inspired by Gemini Conductor. v2.1.0: Added explicit name: fields to commands for prefix-free invocation. Full-featured implementation with TDD workflow, Phase Completion Protocol, Git Notes audit trail, and comprehensive styleguides.

plugins.name: dev
plugins.description: Universal development assistant with real skill discovery. v1.31.3: Statusline extracted to standalone plugin. 46 skills.

plugins.name: statusline
plugins.description: Colorful statusline with worktree awareness, plan limits with reset countdowns, token counts, compaction detection, and customizable themes. v1.3.0: Compaction warning âš¡ at 80%+, per-session token cache.
